Wheeljack-X::

Jackie remains in his faster vehicle form, still waiting for his 
internal repair system to put the finishing touches on his robot 
mode.  However, that doesn't mean he doesn't get involved, gleefully 
raking the base with his Gatling laser.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> ::Rodimus Prime::
> 
> "That's correct Blackfang. We only atack the Predacons. Leave the 
other group. Only attack them if pervoked."
> 
> They come into the battle.
> 
> "Here we are, Maximals kick ass!"
> 
> Rodimus transformed to bot mode, and fires on the Predacon base 
with his plasma gun.
